entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain changing to periods of drizzle and ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2 except minus 5 inland. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
